item.title: Hypermodern Python Chapter 6: CI/CD
item.description: Read this article on Medium In this sixth and last installment of the Hypermodern Python series, I’m going to discuss how to add continuous integration and delivery to your project using GitHub Actions, Poetry, and Nox.1 In the previous chapter, we discussed how to add documentation. (If you start reading here, you can also download the code for the previous chapter.) Here are the topics covered in this chapter on Continuous Integration and Delivery:
